results.name: Coefficients in q-expansion of E_2*E_4, where E_2 and E_4 are the Eisenstein series shown in A006352 and A004009, respectively.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: E := proc(k) local n, t1; global M;
